title: Jarman in Pieces
description:
Jarman in Pieces is a performance collage dedicated to filmmaker, painter, and gay rights activist, Derek Jarman, by multimedia duo, Project Adorno. The performance comprises original songs, film, and interviews from people who knew Jarman and his work. Followed by a screening of Jarman’s last film, ‘Blue’

Book online at: http://bit.ly/2BKi609, by phone at: 01223352932, or pay at the box
ofce on the day

Cost: General admission £8, concessions £6
